Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Lyon "Zack A Lyon"
Reviews.Content: Ordered for my mom. The only complaint if you want to call it that is one touch flash button wasn't found until wasting a couple of frames.[Be sure and push it before the the first flash].  then no problems

Reviews.Title: VIVITAR /KODAK 35MM POINT AND SHOOT
Reviews.Author: Tons Of Tapes
Reviews.Content: IF YOU STILL LIKE TO USE 35MM FILM ,THIS IS A GOOD LITTLE CAMERA FOR POINT AND SHOOT PICTURES. iT CAN ALSO BE USED AS BACKUP IF YOUR DIGITAL CAMERA SHOULD GO DOWN.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: SHARON MORTON
Reviews.Content: this camera was not what i expected it to be.  very disappointed.  not enought features.  not something i will invest in.

ProductInfo.Features:
Made by Kodak
35mm Film Camera
Silver/Chrome Color
Requires Batteries
Kodak KV270
ProductInfo.Name: VIVITAR KV-270 COMPACT 35MM CAMERA (FULLY MOTORIZED)
